autonomous_agent_apis.name: OpenAI Agents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Systems that intelligently accomplish tasks from simple goals to complex workflows.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Widely adopted by enterprises and developers for various applications.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Strong community engagement, usage in production environments.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: LangChain
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A framework for developing applications powered by language models.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Popular choice for building LLM applications with extensive community support.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Used in many production applications and documented extensively.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: CrewAI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Open-source framework for orchestrating autonomous AI agents and building complex workflows.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Designed for high-performance AI applications with enterprise features.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Rapidly growing community and usage in production-level projects.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: AutoGen
autonomous_agent_apis.description: An event-driven programming framework for building scalable multi-agent AI systems.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Backed by Microsoft and tailored for enterprise application development.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Increasing adoption in enterprise AI projects.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Semantic Kernel
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A framework for creating AI applications that leverage semantic understanding.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Developed by Microsoft with a focus on semantic technologies.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Used in academic research and enterprise applications.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: LlamaIndex
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A library for connecting LLMs to external data sources.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Useful for applications needing external data connectivity.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Gaining traction in AI development communities.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: SuperAGI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: An open-source autonomous AI agent framework enabling developers to build, manage & run agents.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Focuses on developer-first experiences with extensive documentation.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Rapidly growing user base and community contributions.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Vertex AI Agent Builder
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A full-stack agentic transformation system that helps you create, manage, and deploy AI agents.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Part of a broader Google Cloud ecosystem, making it enterprise-ready.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Integrated into many enterprise applications and services.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: AWS Bedrock Agents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Build and configure autonomous agents in your application using AWS services.
autonomous_agent_apis.curation_reason: Robust infrastructure provided by AWS, widely used in enterprise environments.
autonomous_agent_apis.adoption_indicators: Strong presence in enterprise applications, leveraging AWS resources.
